text: Technology can help solve the
most important challenges for the Earth,
including climate change,
and building more sustainable cities.
Satellite data

can be too complex
for most people,

making it difficult to
understand or use simply.

At Latitudo 40,
we want to change this situation

to allow anyone to exploit
the potential of satellite data

without the need to be a data
scientist or computer expert.
Thanks to artificial intelligence and AWS cloud,

we can process huge
amounts of satellite data
in a few hours instead of months.

This allows cities to 
respond quickly

to the predicted climate challenges,
we are experiencing daily.

AWS provides the processing 
power we need

to transform the raw data into 
actionable insights

that drive the significant changes in urban 
and environmental planning.
We help major European cities

to become global leaders
in climate resilience.
